post.body: LOL is such awesomeness hurling shoes. shoes are too good to hurl at bush.
at albert hall come meet us for gin and tonics and good times.no golf here
but are you actually playing golf? If so, why? God, why?
we're not sure what to do with our waterbabies either. Bit nervous to throw them down the drain lest they absorb the sea.
yes, you have a good deal.
americans don't cook. they order takeout.
had an awesome run this morning. feeling very positive and happy and excited for summer.
shoulders still stiff from massage on sat. rly want another one. is a bad habit to get into.
leave is approved - yeehah. friday is my last day.
Can't wait to run tomorrow morning.
Helping rei cook pasta with basil, fresh tomato, ginger garlic chilli breadcrumbs and olives.feeling okay.
Sticking packaging scraps in my notebook to make me seem interesting and passionate.
Now exhausted and ready for a nap.
Also managed to pick up some letraset. And some shortbread. And a handmade ceramic soap dish.
Had great morning in kalk bay. Bought olympia deli lunch. Got rad grey off-shoulder top from india jane.
Back from albert hall.Stopped at engen to pick up 1xtoffee steri stumpie and 1x strawberry steri stumpie.feel alive.
In the mood for a cocktail on this perfect summer's eve in cape town. Anyone else?
In a daze. Had amazing full body massage this am. Spent afternoon in natural history museum.fantastic.
At vida wembley watching waddy jones write rhymes while his wife entertains his daughter with giant my little pony.
Going for a massage.
No appetite but endless nervous energy. Wish i had a popple.
Watching Popples cartoon. Waiting for 10 am so can go get my massage. Feel like my sanity depends on it.
Up really early. Too early for saturday.
Sunned, salty, superbly happy. Holidays by the sea will do that to you.
On my way up the coast. Yay.
Can't wait to lie on the beach and frolick in the sea.
Packing. Going to the Hamptons tomorrow. Charter plane leaves at 11. Going to go for run early tomorrow am.
The song was Madonna's Material Girl, btw.
Feeling proud about getting SingStar rating with @swartperd earlier. Only 600 odd points from a perfect score.rad.
Fleeing.
Wondering if i should flee up the coast and make an impromptu escape.
Feeling so happy to be on holiday. It's still sinking in.
Feeling the awesomeness in the air.
and... we're out.
think i have found place to stay. just one more flat to see before i make up my mind. painless. yay.
1 minute to go until leave.
rad. canal walk shopping voucher as xmas pressie from agency. takes care of my xmas shopping.
very NB, please read http://tinyurl.com/66urot
more vida! iced coffee with mark and rikus. gelado goodness. not much to do at the office. hankering for a run. going to go this afternoon.
mmm. vida goodness for the morning. going to see miss moxyland and her baby at lunch.
